name: box-node-lambda-sample
description: This sample demonstrates how to call Box APIs from a Lambda function using the Box Node SDK.

scripts.zip: rm -rf node_modules/asn1/tst; zip -rMM9 box-node-lambda-sample index.js node_modules
scripts.bp: rm -rf node_modules/asn1/tst; zip -rMM9 box-node-lambda-sample-bp index.js lambda.json node_modules

author: Box <oss@box.com>
